DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Feasibility EctoinÂ® Inhalation Solution Inflammatory Obstruction Ageing Lung
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal female ( 75 80 year ) FEV1/FVC < 0,77 ( investigation 2007/2008 ) Inflammatory marker TFNalpha > median neutrophilic granulocyte > median ( investigation 2007/2008 ) Non smoker ex smoker stop smoke longer 6 month Participation another clinical study previous month Severe concomitant disease may impact study participation Hypersensitivity Ectoin Myocardial infarction apoplexy within last year Uncontrolled hypertension : systolic blood pressure > 200 mmHg diastolic pressure > 120 mmHg Known aortic aneurysm Other respiratory disease ( e.g . cystic fibrosis , alpha1Antitrypsin deficiency , sarcoidosis , allergic alveolitis , tuberculosis , etc . ) Patients treatment live attenuate vaccination within 14 day prior screen visit ( Inactivated influenza vaccination acceptable , provide administer within 7 day prior screen visit ) investigator decision
